Hello there!

Welcome!

I am Yadu. I spend most of my time on Code, Art, and the rest I prefer to call as Life. This blog reflects the same, and I tag posts as such.

What happened to my old blog?

Posterous got acquired by twitter, followed by them shutting down their services. I have been a wanderer since then, searching for the simpest blogging platform. After a lot of searching, I think Jekyllbootstrap with github pages comes closest to my expectation of simplicity.
